Shortening column names for meteorological variables

Source: R/meteo_shortening_imgw.R
meteo_shortening_imgw.Rd

Shortening column names of meteorological parameters to improve the readability of downloaded dataset from the danepubliczne.imgw.pl collection and removing duplicated column names

meteo_shortening_imgw(data, col_names = "short", remove_duplicates = TRUE)

Arguments

data

downloaded dataset with original column names

col_names

three types of column names possible: "short" - default, values with shorten names, "full" - full English description, "polish" - original names in the dataset

remove_duplicates

whether to remove duplicated column names (default TRUE - i.e., columns with duplicated names are deleted)

Examples

# \donttest{
  monthly = meteo_imgw("monthly", rank = "climate", year = 1969)
#> [1] "https://danepubliczne.imgw.pl/data/dane_pomiarowo_obserwacyjne/dane_meteorologiczne/miesieczne/klimat/k_m_d_format.txt"
#> /tmp/RtmpcOzvAb/file18110328509
#> [1] "https://danepubliczne.imgw.pl/data/dane_pomiarowo_obserwacyjne/dane_meteorologiczne/miesieczne/klimat/k_m_t_format.txt"
#> /tmp/RtmpcOzvAb/file1811f09c94f
#> [1] "https://danepubliczne.imgw.pl/data/dane_pomiarowo_obserwacyjne/dane_meteorologiczne/miesieczne/klimat/"
#> /tmp/RtmpcOzvAb/file181311008f3
#> [1] "https://danepubliczne.imgw.pl/data/dane_pomiarowo_obserwacyjne/dane_meteorologiczne/miesieczne/klimat/1966_1970/1966_1970_m_k.zip"
#> /tmp/RtmpcOzvAb/file18169e9ff10
  colnames(monthly)
#>  [1] "rank"             "id"               "station"          "yy"              
#>  [5] "mm"               "tmax_abs"         "tmax_mean"        "tmin_abs"        
#>  [9] "tmin_mean"        "t2m_mean_mon"     "t5cm_min"         "rr_monthly"      
#> [13] "rr_max_daily"     "first_day_max_rr" "last_day_max_rr"  "snowcover_max"   
#> [17] "snowcover_days"   "rain_days"        "snow_days"        "rh_mean_mon"     
#> [21] "ws_mean_mon"      "cloud_mean_mon"  
  abbr = climate:::meteo_shortening_imgw(data = monthly,
      col_names = "full", 
      remove_duplicates = TRUE)
  head(abbr)
#>           rank        id  station   yy mm tmax_abs tmax_mean tmin_abs tmin_mean
#> 37 KLIMATYCZNA 249180010 PSZCZYNA 1969  1      9.5      -1.3    -20.0      -9.3
#> 41 KLIMATYCZNA 249180010 PSZCZYNA 1969  2      7.4       0.4    -16.6      -4.7
#> 42 KLIMATYCZNA 249180010 PSZCZYNA 1969  3     11.4       2.5    -10.6      -3.5
#> 43 KLIMATYCZNA 249180010 PSZCZYNA 1969  4     27.5      13.1     -4.4       2.0
#> 44 KLIMATYCZNA 249180010 PSZCZYNA 1969  5     30.0      21.3      2.0       9.0
#> 45 KLIMATYCZNA 249180010 PSZCZYNA 1969  6     28.9      20.9      6.1      10.5
#>    t2m_mean_mon t5cm_min rr_monthly rr_max_daily first_day_max_rr
#> 37         -5.1    -22.4       34.9         12.0               23
#> 41         -2.3    -17.5       47.2         15.9                8
#> 42         -0.8    -11.3       44.8         10.1               11
